A Humblewood Adventure

Bella

Daughter of Elder Ardwyn and a grove cervan who is a good witch and a patron of a unicorn. Her unicorn gifted her with a Rod of the Pact Keeper to channel her magic.

Won a game of Liar’s Dice against Nico wagering 1 gp.
